titleInfo.title: PZ 2108/40 'Press article by H N Brailsford: need to discourage this type of article'

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in approximate chronological order from the rear to the front of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence for this description commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 6; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: This file contains correspondence sent between British officials in the India relating to their reactions to an article, 'Why this army in the East?', which was written by Henry Noel Brailsford and published by the British newspaper Reynolds News.The main correspondents are Roland Tennyson Peel (Assistant Secretary for Political (External) Department) and Edward Walter Fletcher (Deputy Secretary for the External Affairs Department).
